alert.note: Alert for Bronx; Northern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued January 09 at 3:33PM EST until January 10 at 12:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM EST THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Less than 1 ft of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline with both tonight and Wednesday morning high tide. * WHERE...Bronx and Northern Queens Counties. * WHEN...From this evening through Wednesday morning around the times of high tide. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy rain during this evening high tide will exacerbate urban and poor drainage flood issues for coastal and shoreline roads.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
